msg_extension_description.message: Eliminate the hassle of search for exact match!

msg_command_description_do_quoted_search.message: Do "Quoted Search" for the selected text

msg_command_description_put_quotes.message: Put quotes around the selected text

msg_context_menu_title_do_quoted_search.message: Do "Quoted Search" for the selected text

msg_context_menu_title_put_quotes.message: Put quotes around the selected text

msg_options_description_content_popup_ic.message: Popup icon $1 appears right next to the mouse pointer when selecting text. Clicking popup icon helps you quickly do "Quoted Search".
You can drag popup icon to move it. Drag it when it is in the way, such as overlapping popups displayed by other extensions.

msg_options_description_content_icon_siz.message: Choose the size of popup icon $1.

msg_options_description_content_avoid_se.message: Popup icon $1 appears avoiding selected text range.
If this option is enabled, depending on the structure of the page, popup icon may appear far away from the mouse pointer.

msg_options_description_content_options_.message: Options button $1 appears next to popup icon $2 when you hover the mouse pointer over it.

msg_options_description_content_context_.message: Items to invoke functions of Quick Quoted Search appear in context menu displayed upon a right-click mouse operation.

msg_options_description_content_disposit.message: Choose where you want the results of "Quoted Search" to appear.
Only when you click popup icon $1 to search, you can override this choice by pressing the following keys:
Pressing above keys has no effect when search is invoked from keyboard shortcuts or context menus instead of clicking popup icon.

msg_options_description_content_auto_cop.message: Automatically copy quoted words to the system clipboard when doing "Quoted Search". This allows you to quickly find the search words in web pages with $1 + $2 → $1 + $3.

msg_options_description_content_auto_ent.message: Automatically press $1 key to do search immediately after putting quotes around the selected text in an input field.
This feature only works for the input field of the following search engine sites:

msg_options_description_content_auto_sur.message: Automatically surround the selected text in an input field with quotes when typing double quotation mark ($1).

msg_options_description_content_select_s.message: Quick Quoted Search uses the default search engine configured in your browser.
You can specify your favorite search engine as the default.

msg_options_description_content_customiz.message: You can customize keyboard shortcuts invoking functions of Quick Quoted Search.

msg_options_restore_defaults_dialog_cont.message: Restores all options to their default values.
